# Diego Sánchez (CuB1z) Portfolio

Diego Sánchez is a Software Engineer and Full Stack Developer based in Madrid, Spain.

## Navigation

- / (Home): Introduction and featured content.
- /projects: Showcase of technical projects.
- /resume: Professional experience and CV.
- /blog: Tech articles and thoughts.

## Technical Skills

- Languages: TypeScript, Java, Python, C++
- Web: React, Astro, Next.js, TailwindCSS
- Backend: Spring Boot, NodeJS
- Tools: Git, Docker, GitHub Actions

## Contact

Find me on GitHub and LinkedIn as CuB1z.
